item.title: Le Web 3, Lundi au Mercredi
item.description: I’ll be presenting LouderVoice at Le Web 3 on Tuesday at 2.30pm. We’re up against 29 other web start-ups from around Europe and I have 7 minutes to dazzle. Wish us luck! You can get me on my normal mobile (+353-87-9790297) or my MAXRoam numbers: +353-1-5262888 +44-208-8199686 +1-206-420-5964
